page.title: 14GAMES, TOYS, CREATIVE PLAY
page.content: My favourite toys are my flower fairy and my little pony. I have two costumes for my flower fairy; one is yellow and the other is purple. My best ponies are Bow Tie and Apple Jack. I like my BMX and I like my A- Team figures and my He Man. I like my Superman Book and my computer games. In my garden Rachel and I play Cindy. I have got two Cindys. I have a lot of Cindy clothes. My Cindy worked in the ice cream shop. Daniel and I played in some long grass. We trampled down some grass and made pathways. We made some islands too. They are called Rainbow Island, Buttercup Island and Cross Road. We put pretend treasure in the islands. I went to play with Scott and I took my gun. We played tennis and we played on the conker tree.
